alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Horry County through 300 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nixonville, or 8 miles northeast of Red Hill. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Red Hill, Hickory Grove, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Bucksville, Hand, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Wampee, Forestbrook, Hammond, Coastal Carolina University, Bucksport, Briarcliffe Acres and Atlantic Beach. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 19 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
